subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: While Jeremy Jones and Bryan Iguchi readied for a descent of the Grand Teton, a spring storm hit Wyoming. As they waited for the storm to clear, the snowboarders embraced the snow.
snippet: While Jeremy Jones and Bryan Iguchi readied for a descent of the Grand Teton, a spring storm hit Wyoming. As they waited for the storm to clear, the snowboarders embraced the snow.
